product_details.name: Apple Premium Device Bundle - MacBook Pro, iPad & iPhone Set
product_details.description:
• Complete Apple ecosystem solution for seamless integration across devices
• MacBook Pro with Retina Display and backlit keyboard
• Large trackpad with Multi-Touch gesture support
• iPad with high-resolution display, perfect for multimedia and productivity
• iPhone featuring Touch ID and premium aluminum design
• All devices running latest Apple operating systems
• Synchronized data and content across all devices via iCloud
• Perfect for professionals, creatives, and Apple enthusiasts
• Sleek aluminum construction across all devices
• Built-in productivity and creativity apps ecosystem
• Wireless connectivity and AirDrop capability between devices
• Premium build quality and long-lasting durability

banner_details:
The banner features a clean and modern design promoting a tech bundle. The background is predominantly a soft off-white with abstract wave elements and circular highlights in pastel shades, creating a tech-savvy look. At the top center, the bold and sleek heading (id: `heading`) introduces the product line, immediately followed by a subheading (id: `subheading`) detailing the bundle components. The focal point is the product image (id: `product_image`), showcasing a MacBook, iPad, and iPhone in full view. Beneath it, the price (id: `price`) stands out in large, dark bold lettering. A contrasting call-to-action button (ids: `cta_background`, `cta`) labeled “SHOP NOW” makes purchasing easy and inviting.

**Color Palette:**
- Soft White: `#F5F5F7`
- Accent Blue: `#E0E5FF`
- Pale Blue (Wave Shapes): `#D1D7EF`
- Deep Charcoal: `#1D1D1F`
- Button Text: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image features Apple devices—MacBook, iPad, and iPhone—against a clean white background, emphasizing minimalist design. The silver-gray hardware (#C0C0C0) offers a sleek, modern look, while black elements (#000000) like keyboards and screens add contrast. The MacBook’s vibrant screen highlights a natural scenery with pastel sky tones merging pink (#E4A8C3), peach (#F8C7A5), and lavender (#B4A3D8), blending smoothly into earthy browns (#9C6A4E) and subtle forest greens (#2E3B2F). These colors create a calm, professional aesthetic. For an advertisement banner, a palette of silver, black, pastel pink, lavender, and soft blue (#A5C9F8) would evoke elegance, innovation, and visual harmony.
